name: Carns Capra
content: Carns Capra was a Human male who joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. His father had been one of the earliest Rebel leaders, and had been killed on Mantooine defending the power generators. Although impulsive and eager to strike at the Galactic Empire, he was not stupid. Alongside Denis Rygelli, Ben Spax and Trinna Orani, he was briefed by General Airen Cracken on the procedures for establishing a Rebel cell structure on an Imperial-held planet.
